T02D3476:125a-1: manydzu shr'i badzra s'a dha nam /
T02D3476:125a-4: dpal 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3476:125a-5: don rnams phun sum tshogs gyur pa //
T02D3476:125a-6: bdag nyid 'jam dpal rdo rjer bya //
T02D3476:125a-7: sems can rnams kyi 'khrul bltas nas //
T02D3476:125a-8: dang por yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02D3476:125a-9: snying gar mam yig de nyid dgod //
T02D3476:125a-10: mchod cing mngon par phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3476:125a-11: bla ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D3476:125b-0: skur gyur gsum @125b la skyabs 'gro sogs //
T02D3476:125b-1: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3476:125b-2: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D3476:125b-3: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D3476:125b-4: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3476:125b-5: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
T02D3476:125b-6: mtshan med rgyu dang bral ba ste //
T02D3476:125b-7: smon pa dang bral dngos kun gyi ;
T02D3476:125b-8: / rtog pa spangs ba nyid du 'dod //
T02D3476:125b-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:125b-10: gru gsum dkar po mtho ba'i dbyibs //
T02D3476:125b-11: sna tshogs chu skyes rdo rje'i dbus //
T02D3476:125b-12: mchod rten nang du rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3476:125b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' rig bcas bsgom //
T02D3476:125b-14: de yi zhal bzhugs de bzhin du //
T02D3476:125b-15: rang sems rdo rje las 'thon nas //
T02D3476:125b-16: yi ge gsum byung chu skyes la //
T02D3476:125b-17: ho yig gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3476:125b-18: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D3476:125b-19: de nas lus ni zhu bar blta //
T02D3476:125b-20: zla ba khu ba'i 'od zer zhu //
T02D3476:125b-21: mer mer la sogs yang dag 'dzin //
T02D3476:125b-22: phyogs kun na gnas lha mo rnams //
T02D3476:125b-23: glus bskul de yi phyi nas ni ;
T02D3476:125b-24: /'gro rnams bde bar rab bsgrub pa'i //
T02D3476:125b-25: bdag nyid bzhengs pa bsam par bya //
T02D3476:125b-26: rdo rje'i thugs khyod gnas kyi dbang phyug sems can khams //
T02D3476:125b-27: skyob pa dag ni dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod //
T02D3476:125b-28: gnyen chen sems can yab nyid bdag la 'dod pa yis //
T02D3476:125b-29: gal te mgon pos bdag la 'dod mdzad 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3476:125b-30: rdo rje'i sku khyod sems can mnga' brnyes bka'i 'khor lo //
T02D3476:125b-31: sangs rgyas ched du don dam byang chub phan rjes ston //
T02D3476:125b-32: chags pas 'dod chags dam tshig m'a ma k'i bdag la //
T02D3476:125b-33: gal te mgon pos bdag la 'dod mdzad 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3476:125b-34: rdo rje gsung khyod kun la phan mdzad brtse ba can //
T02D3476:125b-35: 'jig rten don gyi bya mdzad rtag tu yang dag
T02D3476:125b-36: 'jug /'dod pas bdag la shin tu spyod mdzad kun
T02D3476:125b-37: du bzang // gal te mgon pos bdag la 'dod mdzad 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3476:125b-38: rdo rje'i sku khyod dam tshig mchog gi phan chen don //
T02D3476:125b-39: rdzogs byang rgyud la dod bzhin mnyam nyid brtse ba can //
T02D3476:125b-40: 'dod pas bdag la yon tan rin chen gter mang byung //
T02D3476:125b-41: gal te mgon pos bdag la 'dod mdzad 'tsho bar 'gyur //
T02D3476:125b-42: bcom ldan de nyid la gshegs kyang //
T02D3476:125b-43: lha mo rnams kyis glu yis bskul //
T02D3476:125b-44: dngos rnams sgyu ma ltar rig nas //
T02D3476:125b-45: rang gi sngags don bsgom par bya //
T02D3476:126a-2: 'gro ba gsum po rab tu bsgrub //
T02D3476:126a-3: mam yig las byung rtag las ni //
T02D3476:126a-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang byon nyid //
T02D3476:126a-5: sku mdog dmar po gur gum 'dra //
T02D3476:126a-6: sngo dang dkar po zhal gsum ste //
T02D3476:126a-7: phyag gnyis rang 'od rig ma la //
T02D3476:126a-9: phyag na ral gri mda' dang ni //
T02D3476:126a-10: gzhu dang autpal sngon po bsnams //
T02D3476:126a-11: sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba'i gdan //
T02D3476:126a-12: rdo rje skyil krung zla 'od bzhin //
T02D3476:126a-13: srid par chags shing 'khor ba las //
T02D3476:126a-14: yang dag chags shing chags bral mdzad //
T02D3476:126a-15: dpal 'jam rdo rjer kun bdag nyid //
T02D3476:126a-16: thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsam//
T02D3476:126a-17: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-18: mig sogs rnams la 'od zer gyis //
T02D3476:126a-19: de nas sa bon la gzhug bya //
T02D3476:126a-20: ksh'im dzrim kham gam skam sam zhes //
T02D3476:126a-21: sa bon rnams kyis nyer bsgrub po //
T02D3476:126a-22: sa dbang rdo rje nam mkha' dang /
T02D3476:126a-23: 'jigs dbang sgrib sel kun du bzang //
T02D3476:126a-24: de bzhin rdo rje skye mched rnams //
T02D3476:126a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs so //
T02D3476:126a-26: rang gi mgo bo mgrin snying zla //
T02D3476:126a-27: aom a'a: h'um gi sngags 'od kyis //
T02D3476:126a-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02D3476:126a-29: sngags kyi bdag po bsgom par bya //
T02D3476:126a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'ak badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-33: rdo rje gsum gyi mtshan nyid bltas //
T02D3476:126a-34: snying gar ye shes sa bon las //
T02D3476:126a-35: phyogs rnams kun byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3476:126a-36: rig ma mchod cing rig dbang 'dzin //
T02D3476:126a-37: spyan dang sku sogs byin gyis brlab //
T02D3476:126a-38: rang sngags las byung 'od gsal ma //
T02D3476:126a-39: mgo bo snying ga lte gsang zhabs ;
T02D3476:126a-40: / sku sogs rdo rje rnam blta zhing //
T02D3476:126a-41: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a zhes pa'i //
T02D3476:126a-42: yan lag lnga 'od rab tu gsal //
T02D3476:126a-43: sku dbang mi g-yo rin chen dbang //
T02D3476:126a-44: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02D3476:126a-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-46: rdo rje chu skyes sbyor las byung //
T02D3476:126a-47: phyogs kun dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
T02D3476:126a-48: rdzogs sangs bsgom bya rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3476:126a-49: de tshe gzugs rdor ma sogs kyis //
T02D3476:126a-50: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3476:126a-51: chos kun lha la bstod pa ni //
T02D3476:126a-52: sgra snyan sgra ni bzang po yis //
T02D3476:126a-53: rang gi nga rgyal mchog zhugs shing //
T02D3476:126b-0: rang yid lhag pa'i tshig @126b 'di ste //
T02D3476:126b-1: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-2: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-3: stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-4: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-5: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-7: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud//
T02D3476:126b-11: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-13: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-15: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-16: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-18: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-19: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-20: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D3476:126b-21: sha mu ma ra bi sogs dang //
T02D3476:126b-22: lnga ni da ha na go ku //
T02D3476:126b-23: yid gsum bdud rtsi'i zas kyis ni //
T02D3476:126b-24: lus ngag yid ni dag par bya //
T02D3476:126b-25: rgyu yi nus pa mi bsam ste //
T02D3476:126b-27: 'di nyid kyis kyang pha rol gyi //
T02D3476:126b-28: byang chub thob par thub pas gsungs //
T02D3476:126b-29: yi ge gsum gyi nang zhugs sngags //
T02D3476:126b-30: spros nas sku sogs rdo rje yis //
T02D3476:126b-31: mkha' khyab sngags mthar bsdu ba dang //
T02D3476:126b-32: mkhas pas de yi bzlas pa bya //
T02D3476:126b-33: de bzhin bzlas pas skyo gyur na //
T02D3476:126b-34: spyi bor zla ba aom gsher las //
T02D3476:126b-35: tshim pa nyid du 'gyur pa'i phyir //
T02D3476:126b-36: byang chub sems bzlas slar yang ni //
T02D3476:126b-37: kun la rmi lam sgyu sogs bzhin //
T02D3476:126b-38: bya ba thams cad 'gro phan phyir //
T02D3476:126b-39: 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid bskyed nas //
T02D3476:126b-40: rgyun mi 'chad par gtso bo bsgom //
T02D3476:126b-41: sngags pas mchod pa la sogs bya //
T02D3476:126b-42: dam pa'i skye bo las skyes 'dod //
T02D3476:126b-43: yi ge gsum phan rdzogs sangs bsgom //
T02D3476:126b-44: sku la sogs pa brtag par bya //
T02D3476:126b-45: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis //
T02D3476:126b-47: 'gro ba'i de nyid las skyes pa'i //
T02D3476:126b-48: smon lam dag ni spel bar bya //
T02D3476:126b-49: dpal ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje ni //
T02D3476:126b-50: bsgoms pa las thob dge ba 'dis //
T02D3476:126b-51: 'jam dpal ye shes skur gyur nas //
T02D3476:126b-52: 'gro ba kun la mchog sbyin shog / gang tshe blta bar 'dod pa dang //
T02D3476:127a-2: de la de bzhin mgon 'di bstan //
T02D3476:127a-3: 'jam dpal mgon po bgegs med cing //
T02D3476:127a-4: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i //
T02D3476:127a-5: sems can don rnams ma lus bsgrub //
T02D3476:127a-6: ji ltar 'jam pa'i spyod pa bzhin //
T02D3476:127a-7: bdag kyang spyod cing bsten par shog / ji srid dang po mthar thug pa'i //
T02D3476:127a-8: 'khor ba'i mtha' yang spangs gyur pa //
T02D3476:127a-9: de srid sems can phan mdzad nyid //
T02D3476:127a-10: spyod pa tshad med bdag gis spyad //
T02D3476:127a-11: ji srid sangs rgyas ma lus rnams //
T02D3476:127a-13: de rnams kyi yang bstan pa'i phyir//
T02D3476:127a-14: dus re dus rer bdag gis spyad //
T02D3476:127a-15: byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D3476:127a-16: thams cad du ni bdag gis spyad //
T02D3476:127a-17: sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams //
T02D3476:127a-18: de dang de tshe bdag gis 'dul //
T02D3476:127a-19: langs nas 'jam dpal mgon po yi //
T02D3476:127a-20: spyod pa'i nga rgyal mnyam gzhag las //
T02D3476:127a-21: thams cad lha yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D3476:127a-22: yul gyi rjes 'brang bzlas bar bya //
T02D3476:127a-23: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas //
T02D3476:127a-24: zhal gsum phyag drug de bzhin du //
T02D3476:127a-25: 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che //
T02D3476:127a-26: padma ral gri phyag na bsnams //
T02D3476:127a-27: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
T02D3476:127a-28: ro dang reg bya chos rnams dang //
T02D3476:127a-29: sku dang rdo rje rin dbang dang ;
T02D3476:127a-30: /'od dpag don yod ngo bos bskyed //
T02D3476:127a-31: yul lnga'i gzugs su gyur pa las //
T02D3476:127a-32: sangs rgyas thams cad khong du chud //
T02D3476:127a-33: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas //
T02D3476:127a-34: rang gzhan de bzhin mchod par bya //
T02D3476:127a-35: tha dang nyal dang khrus dang ni //
T02D3476:127a-36: de bzhin stan la 'dug pa yang //
T02D3476:127a-37: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas ;
T02D3476:127a-38: / kun kyang rang bzhin brtag par bya //
T02D3476:127a-39: mdor bsdus yan lag bzhi pa yi //
T02D3476:127a-40: don bris legs par bshad pa yis //
